abilities.name: Character Level
abilities.description: Grows with character progression by the accumulation of Experience Points and normally ranges from 1 to 12, with most Player-characters limited to 10.

abilities.name: Trade Rank
abilities.description: Comes with a title according to the organization to which a character belongs.

abilities.name: Social Rank
abilities.description: Based on background. Most characters are Commoners at Rank zero but some can be Lords, Counts, Marks, Princesses, Queens, or Emperor, etc.

abilities.name: Wealth Rank
abilities.description: Based on background.

abilities.name: Endurance
abilities.description: Ability to ignore Fatigue and Weariness

abilities.name: Resilience
abilities.description: Ability to ignore Stress

abilities.name: Resistance
abilities.description: Ability to ignore Rads

abilities.name: Hitpoints
abilities.description: Represents zeal, and ability to avoid Damage. Protects Bodypoints.

abilities.name: Bodypoints
abilities.description: Represents how much bodily Injury can be had before a character will die.

abilities.name: Gasp Limit
abilities.description: How long a character can hold its breath.

abilities.name: Sleep Limit
abilities.description: How long before needing to sleep.

abilities.name: Manapool
abilities.description: How much mana available for magic.

abilities.name: Favor Dice
abilities.description: Acquired by worship of a Deity. Increases with the Character Level [ PML ].

abilities.name: Physicality
abilities.description: The physical solidness of the character.

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: How quickly to recover lost Hitpoints.

abilities.name: Movement Ability
abilities.description: Varies by Stature, SIZ, and STR

abilities.name: Throwing Ability
abilities.description: Varies by STR and weight thrown

abilities.name: Carrying Ability
abilities.description: Varies by STR and SIZ.

abilities.name: Cellburn
abilities.description: How much extra mana can be added to a Spell, Magic Item, or Action.

abilities.name: Stature
abilities.description: Character's height modifier.

abilities.name: Build
abilities.description: Character's body build modifier.

abilities.name: Fatigue
abilities.description: Energy and effort, physical resource. Recovers quickly. Affects Endurance.

abilities.name: Weariness
abilities.description: Long-term energy and effort. Recovers by resting and sleeping. Affects Endurance.

abilities.name: Stress
abilities.description: Energy and effort, psychological resource. Recover by rest. Affects by Resilience.

abilities.name: Rads
abilities.description: Acquired from exposure to radiation and to magic. Dangerous. Affects Resistance.
